Appetizers.Name: Chicken Fingers
Appetizers.Description: Golden pan fried chicken breast, comes with dipping sauce of your choice.

Appetizers.Name: Mac 'n Cheese
Appetizers.Description: Perfectly baked and smothered mac and cheese.

Appetizers.Name: Disco Fries
Appetizers.Description: The ultimate late-night snack, it's a platter of crispy fries topped with gooey melted cheese and savory gravy.

Cold Sandwiches.Name: Turkey BLT Club
Cold Sandwiches.Description: Premium carved, oven roasted turkey breast on choice of bread with lettuce, tomato, and crispy bacon

Cold Sandwiches.Name: Corned Beef
Cold Sandwiches.Description: his cold corned beef sandwich, layered with Russian dressing and coleslaw, is a New Jersey deli classic!

Cold Sandwiches.Name: Salami, Mozzarella, and Roasted Red Pepper Sandwich
Cold Sandwiches.Description: Layered on a submarine roll, this hearty, satisfying sandwich is perfect for any season with any weather.

Hot Sandwiches.Name: Chicken Parmigiana Sandwich
Hot Sandwiches.Description: Pan-fried Chicken Breast layered with Fresh Marinara Sauce & Melted Mozzarella Cheese, served on an Italian Roll.

Hot Sandwiches.Name: Grilled Italian Sausage
Hot Sandwiches.Description: Italian Sausage, Peppers, Onions, and Herbs on Lightly Toasted Torpedo Roll

Hot Sandwiches.Name: Chicken Cordon Bleu
Hot Sandwiches.Description: Breaded Chicken Breast, Ham & Swiss Cheese, served with Side of Ranch Dressing

Desserts.Name: Cannoli
Desserts.Description: Italian pastry formed in tubes, deep-fried, and filled with sweetened ricotta cheese.

Desserts.Name: German Black Forest Cake
Desserts.Description: A traditional German multi-layered chocolate and cherry torte that was first created in the Black Forest region of Germany.

Desserts.Name: Hot Fudge Sundae
Desserts.Description: Two big dips of vanilla ice cream covered with hot fudge topping, almonds, whipped cream and topped with two cherries.

Drinks.Name: Strawberry Lemonade
Drinks.Description: Treat yourself to this quintessential summer drink, Strawberry Lemonade, there is nothing better on a hot summer day.

Drinks.Name: Frozen Peach Bellini Cocktail
Drinks.Description: Made in the blender with just 4 ingredients, this easy champagne cocktail is a refreshingly boozy beverage to enjoy all summer.

Drinks.Name: Shirley Temple
Drinks.Description: It is a sweet non-alcoholic beverage enjoyed by many kids and adults alike.
